settings.title: the golden vacation giveaway
settings.text:
To celebrate our pop-up at The Grove, weâ€™re partnering with The Luxe Nomad to giveaway the vacation of all vacations. One lucky winner and a friend of their choosing will experience Bali in luxury for 5 nights in their own private villa, decked out on Monday head-to-toe looks, and free roundtrip flights. 

Open to US residents, aged 18+. Enter below.
